title: State liability for data sets
context: [ยง27-44.1] State liability for data sets. Data sets shall be available for informational purposes only. The State does not warrant the fitness of any data set for a particular purpose and shall not be liable for any deficiencies in the completeness or accuracy of any data set, except where the State&rsquo;s conduct would constitute gross negligence, wilful and wanton misconduct, or intentional misconduct. [L 2013, c 263, pt of ยง2]
